languages.text: {n}Прикосновение металла вызывает мучительную, непереносимую боль, которая вырывает из ваших легких истошный крик. В несколько быстрых движений Маражай высекает на вашей шее символ. В воздухе несется вонь паленой плоти и смех ксеноса. Закончив свое дело, Маражай отклоняется и оценивающе смотрит на свою работу.{/n}

{n}The touch of the metal elicits agonising, unbearable pain that tears a bloodcurdling shriek from your lungs. With a few flicks of the blade, Marazhai carves a symbol into your neck. The air fills with the stench of burnt flesh and the xenos's laughter. Having finished his task, Marazhai leans back to assess his work.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Прикосновение металла вызывает мучительную, непереносимую боль, которая вырывает из ваших легких истошный крик. В несколько быстрых движений Маражай высекает на вашей шее символ. В воздухе несется вонь паленой плоти и смех ксеноса. Закончив свое дело, Маражай отклоняется и оценивающе смотрит на свою работу.{/n}

Having finished his task, Marazhai leans back to assess his work.{/n}

The air fills with the stench of burnt flesh and the xenos's laughter. Having finished his task, Marazhai leans back to assess his work.{/n}

The air fills with the stench of burnt flesh and the xenos's laughter. Having finished his task, Marazhai leans back to assess his work.{/n}

languages.text: {n}利刃划在你的皮肤上，激起了难以忍受的剧烈疼痛。它仿佛撕开了你的心肺，发出了令人血脉贲张的尖叫。玛拉斋在你的脖子上轻轻地挥了几刀，便刻好了他的烙印。空气中弥漫着肉体烧焦的恶臭与异形的笑声。玛拉斋刻完之后，俯下了身子，欣赏着自己的手艺。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The touch of the metal elicits agonising, unbearable pain that tears a bloodcurdling shriek from your lungs. With a few flicks of the blade, Marazhai carves a symbol into your neck. The air fills with the stench of burnt flesh and the xenos's laughter. Having finished his task, Marazhai leans back to assess his work.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}利刃划在你的皮肤上，激起了难以忍受的剧烈疼痛。它仿佛撕开了你的心肺，发出了令人血脉贲张的尖叫。玛拉斋在你的脖子上轻轻地挥了几刀，便刻好了他的烙印。空气中弥漫着肉体烧焦的恶臭与异形的笑声。玛拉斋刻完之后，俯下了身子，欣赏着自己的手艺。{/n}

languages.text: {n}金属が体に触れると、耐えられない痛みを感じて、肺から悪夢のような金切り声をあげた。刃を数回振って、マラズハイが首にシンボルを刻む。その場の空気は、焼けた肉の臭いが広がり、異種族の笑い声が響く。ひと仕事終えたマラズハイは、作品を確認しようと後ろにもたれかかった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The touch of the metal elicits agonising, unbearable pain that tears a bloodcurdling shriek from your lungs. With a few flicks of the blade, Marazhai carves a symbol into your neck. The air fills with the stench of burnt flesh and the xenos's laughter. Having finished his task, Marazhai leans back to assess his work.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}金属が体に触れると、耐えられない痛みを感じて、肺から悪夢のような金切り声をあげた。刃を数回振って、マラズハイが首にシンボルを刻む。その場の空気は、焼けた肉の臭いが広がり、異種族の笑い声が響く。ひと仕事終えたマラズハイは、作品を確認しようと後ろにもたれかかった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El contacto del metal te provoca un dolor agónico e insoportable que arranca un escalofriante alarido de tus pulmones. Con varios trazos de su hoja, Marazhai te graba un símbolo en el cuello. El aire se impregna del hedor a carne quemada y la risa del xenos. Una vez concluida su labor, Marazhai se echa hacia atrás para evaluar su obra.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The touch of the metal elicits agonising, unbearable pain that tears a bloodcurdling shriek from your lungs. With a few flicks of the blade, Marazhai carves a symbol into your neck. The air fills with the stench of burnt flesh and the xenos's laughter. Having finished his task, Marazhai leans back to assess his work.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El contacto del metal te provoca un dolor agónico e insoportable que arranca un escalofriante alarido de tus pulmones. Con varios trazos de su hoja, Marazhai te graba un símbolo en el cuello. El aire se impregna del hedor a carne quemada y la risa del xenos. Una vez concluida su labor, Marazhai se echa hacia atrás para evaluar su obra.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La morsure du métal vous inflige une douleur insoutenable et vous arrache un hurlement à glacer le sang. En quelques coups de lame, Marazhai grave un symbole sur votre cou. L'atmosphère est saturée de la puanteur des chairs brûlées et du rire dément du xénos. Sa tâche terminée, il recule d'un pas pour observer le résultat de son travail.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The touch of the metal elicits agonising, unbearable pain that tears a bloodcurdling shriek from your lungs. With a few flicks of the blade, Marazhai carves a symbol into your neck. The air fills with the stench of burnt flesh and the xenos's laughter. Having finished his task, Marazhai leans back to assess his work.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La morsure du métal vous inflige une douleur insoutenable et vous arrache un hurlement à glacer le sang. En quelques coups de lame, Marazhai grave un symbole sur votre cou. L'atmosphère est saturée de la puanteur des chairs brûlées et du rire dément du xénos. Sa tâche terminée, il recule d'un pas pour observer le résultat de son travail.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Als dich das Metall berührt, erlebst du einen quälenden, unerträglichen Schmerz, der dich markerschütternden aufschreien lässt. Marazhai bewegt die Klinge hin und her und brennt dir ein Symbol in den Hals. Der Gestank verbrannten Fleisches und das Gelächter des Xenos erfüllt die Luft. Nachdem Marazhai seine Aufgabe erledigt hat, lehnt er sich zurück, um sein Werk zu begutachten.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The touch of the metal elicits agonising, unbearable pain that tears a bloodcurdling shriek from your lungs. With a few flicks of the blade, Marazhai carves a symbol into your neck. The air fills with the stench of burnt flesh and the xenos's laughter. Having finished his task, Marazhai leans back to assess his work.{/n}

Marazhai bewegt die Klinge hin und her und brennt dir ein Symbol in den Hals. Der Gestank verbrannten Fleisches und das Gelächter des Xenos erfüllt die Luft. Nachdem Marazhai seine Aufgabe erledigt hat, lehnt er sich zurück, um sein Werk zu begutachten.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Metalin dokunuşu; ciğerlerini yırtarak kan dondurucu bir feryat koparmana neden olan, ızdırapla dolu dayanamadığın bir acıya yol açıyor. Marazhai, birkaç bıçak darbesiyle boynuna bir sembol kazıyor. Havayı yanık etin leş gibi kokusu ve zenonun kahkahası kaplıyor. Vazifesini tamamlayan Marazhai, geriye doğru yaslanarak eserini inceliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The touch of the metal elicits agonising, unbearable pain that tears a bloodcurdling shriek from your lungs. With a few flicks of the blade, Marazhai carves a symbol into your neck. The air fills with the stench of burnt flesh and the xenos's laughter. Having finished his task, Marazhai leans back to assess his work.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Metalin dokunuşu, ciğerlerini yırtarak kan dondurucu bir feryat koparmana neden olan, ızdırapla dolu dayanamadığın bir acıya yol açıyor. Marazhai, bıçağın birkaç darbesiyle boynuna bir sembol kazıyor. Havayı yanık etin leş gibi kokusu ve zenonun kahkahası kaplıyor. Vazifesini tamamlayan Marazhai, geriye doğru yaslanarak eserini inceliyor.{/n}
